class.name: SQLite3Backup
class.description: This class wraps the sqlite3_backup* handle and provides methods for performing database backup operations from one database to another.

method.name: step
method.description: Copies up to nPage pages from the source database to the destination. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] if finished, [code]SQLITE_DONE[/code] if more work needed, or an error code.

method.name: remaining
method.description: Returns the number of pages still to be backed up.

method.name: pagecount
method.description: Returns the total number of pages in the source database.

method.name: finish
method.description: Completes the backup operation and releases resources. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.
